doc.title: ARPA

value.content: .arpa (address and routing parameter area) is a top-level domain used for Internet infrastructure purposes, especially reverse DNS lookup (i.e., find the domain name for a given IP address).

value.title: See also
value.content:
• Official website
  • .arpa on Wikipedia
